definition: to eradicate pornography and illegal publications

sentences.english: The joint efforts of different departments to sweep illegal porno publications have achieved great success.
sentences.chinese: 各部門聯合展開的掃黃打非活動成績斐然。

sentences.english: We should launch an anti porn campaign.
We will fight unremittingly against pornographic and illegal publications.
sentences.chinese: 堅持不懈地進行“掃黃”“打非”鬥爭。

sentences.english: We will improve management of the culture market and steadfastly fight against pornography and illegal publications.
sentences.chinese: 加強文化市場管理，堅持開展“掃黃打非”。

sentences.english: Today, some Japanese mothers are still persistent advocate "anti-vice."
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，一些日本母親仍堅持不懈主張“掃黃”。

definition: to crack down on illegal activities/to fight organized crime
to crack down on/to take severe measures against
